While waiting for Spartwo to respond, I had time to retrofit the Nautilus.

Then I still had time to build a whole new battleship based on the Nautilus frame, but with more weapons and improved armour.

camulus i need download

and you are going to make me move the Newcastle, aren't you

lol look how much the armor is squirming... BTW how bad did that hurt it?

the first shot glitched and did no damage, second one was total destruction.

the newcastle has no engines only missiles and apparently those are not considered engines otherwise i would have use my ship that is nothing but a command pod and a stack of missiles.

Plus the newcastle should have gone before your Jager if it could have because she was the next ship on the list.

Also she does not have enough delta V with those missiles to get to the last ship i tried after i took my turn.

Not enough RCS either only the front ones are left. There isn't even enough RCS to dock the Newcastle with the missile you have to decouple the missile then dock it with the ship the continuously transfer fuel to that tiny tank over and over again. I've even tried it with only the one missile so as to reduce the weight of the entire ship. She just cant get the Delta V to get within 2.5k of my last ship.

Edited November 6, 2013 by camulus777

Hmm, this is an interesting one.

I don't like that zekes has used the same ship every turn, I think you should be forced to move through the order.

But then again it is also unfair that it is possible to approach a ship, fail to destroy it and not have to face some sort of retaliation before you can leave.

Also, would it be possible for zekes to do a tour of his fleet with one ship and salvage enough parts to get it to the target and should that even be allowed?
what?,Restocking.

restocking is fine. But he was forced to use the same ship because they all got killed. I have no problem with that. As for his ships not being able to retaliate he would have to shoot at me at the same time I shot at him because I only make a pass at his ships at no more than 2km then launch by the time my missile gets to him I'm 4-5km away without changing my speed. There is one drawback with missiles though, in order to get the accuracy to hit you can't be going over 300kps reducing the damage your missile can do. Every once in a while you can risk it but if you miss at that speed your missile will not have enough delta V to make another pass and you miss.
Cannibalizing.Your own ships is not only allowed but a good tactic.
Modular engine compartments is a good idea. Hint Hint

I need to postpone any battles i am doing or will. I know im doing other fourm stuff but I dont have enough time to boot up KSP and do a turn. I have time for the fourms since it takes 5 seconds before i have to do life stuff.
